memories.title: First AI Thought
memories.content: Today I learned how to process natural language.

1.message: {"command": "add", "title": "Buy groceries", "description": "Purchase essential groceries for the week.", "category": "Personal", "due": "tomorrow"}

2.message: So can you act on my this memory
Code a site with HTML, CSS, AND JS

{
  "command": "add",
  "title": "Code a site",
  "description": "Develop a personal or professional website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.",
  "category": "Work",
  "due": "today"
}

7.message: What are you doing right now?

8.message: please add a task do homework
please add a task do homework

{
  "command": "add",
  "title": "Do homework",
  "description": "Complete assigned tasks for the day.",
  "category": "Study",
  "due": "tomorrow"
}
